Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First observe the data Each case has attributes CaseID Activity Timestamp LocalResident CommunityGroup PreliminaryScore ScoreAdjustment ManualReview Decision Resource

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We see that for cases C001 and C004 they are LocalResident TRUE and have CommunityGroup Highland Civic Darts Club In both during PreliminaryScoring there is a ScoreAdjustment of 10 Community

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: For cases C002 C003 C005 they have CommunityGroup None ScoreAdjustment is 0 No bonus

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Now look at decisions C001 Approved 720 C002 Approved 720 C003 Rejected 715 C004 Approved 700 C005 Approved 740

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: what might be the threshold for approval Possibly a score of 700 or above leads to approval But C003 has 715 rejected possibly because LocalResident FALSE

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: non-locals require a higher score C003 LocalResident FALSE score 715 Rejected C005 LocalResident FALSE score 740 Approved locals approved at 700

Name: Validation - PE
Text: C004 local approved at 700 while C003 non-local rejected at 715 This suggests decision threshold is lower for locals

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: bias is embedded in the automated scoring engine it adds 10 points for community group membership

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: The biases identified 1 Community Group Bias 2 Local Residency Bias This disadvantages non-local applicants and those without affiliation reduces fairness and equity

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - IND
Text: Individuals who lack certain community affiliations or geographic characteristics even when their underlying creditworthiness is similar
